name: GreenStory for WooCommerce
author: greenstory

sections.description:
GreenStory for WooCommerce

Allowing your visitors to see the real impact of your eco-friendly products should be easy. With this plugin, it finally is.

This plugin helps you integrate impact visuals across your WooCommerce pages. You can embed impact visuals in your homepage, all product pages and cart page.

You need to have a GreenStory account for this plugin to work. This plugin allows you to tightly integrate your WooCommerce store with your GreenStory account.

What is GreenStory?

GreenStory (https://greenstory.ca) is a consumer engagement platform for responsible businesses. It bridges the gap of consumer intent vs. action for green purchasing to increase website and in-store conversions.

GreenStory helps companies reach green consumers through credible, transparent and intuitive data backed by 3rd party research. Our tool combined with relatable visuals helps increase conversion, drive new traffic to retailer websites and improve consumer engagement.

Here you can learn more how Green Story works (https://greenstory.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=dd20167e8140ab376752def40&id=9decf05539&e=8b395eb440)

If you are not yet using GreenStory, contact us here for a demo (https://greenstory.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=dd20167e8140ab376752def40&id=f668ad09a9&e=8b395eb440)

Support

If you already have an account with GreenStory, please use the email address inside the plugin for support as that will guarantee a faster response time.

If you are new to Green Story you can contact us here for any questions about GreenStory demo (https://greenstory.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=dd20167e8140ab376752def40&id=f668ad09a9&e=8b395eb440)

FAQ’s

Visual is not displaying on a particular page
If the impact visual is not displaying, please check and confirm whether the client ID entered is the same as that provided by GreenStory

Visual is not displaying for certain products
Visual does not display for a product if that product is not mapped correctly in the Green Story platform. This usually happens if you have added a new product to the store. Please contact Green Story to get the product mapped.

Visuals have stopped displaying across all pages

This happens if your subscription with Green Story has expired. Please contact Green Story to renew your subscription.
sections.installation:
nstalling the plugin

· In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for GreenStory for WooCommerce and click “Install now“

· Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of greenstory-for-woocommerce.zip to your plugins directory, which usually is /wp-content/plugins/.

· Activate the plugin

Configuring Visuals for each page
· Go to GreenStory in the wordpress navigation bar

· Add the client id and place where the widget is supposed to be placed by selecting the desired hook, submit the changes and plugin shoulf appear
